import React from "react"; import { Fade } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import './portfolio.css' import HeaderSocials from "../header/HeaderSocials"; import PortfolioCards from './PortfolioCards' import KIT from '../../assets/KIT.png' import FOREstCAST from '../../assets/FOREstCAST.png' import WEATHER from '../../assets/WEATHER_APP.png' import WORKDAY_SCHEDULER from '../../assets/WORKDAY_SCHEDULER.png' import RUNBUDDY from '../../assets/RUNBUDDY.png' import NOTE_TAKER from '../../assets/NOTE_TAKER.png' const Portfolio = () => { return ( <>

"“Great web design without functionality is like a sports car with no engine.” – Paul Cookson

 ) } export default Portfolio
